channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sound Smart: 6 Observations From the NFL Divisional Round
item.description: Breaking down the biggest talking points from the second round of the postseason.

item.title: Broncos Add a QB Following Bo Nix's Injury, Signing Ben DiNucci to Practice Squad
item.description: The Broncos are adding a quarterback following Bo Nix's season-ending injury.

item.title: 2026 Super Bowl Odds: NFC West Rivals Top Board; Broncos Slide After Nix Injury
item.description: Only four teams remain. Here are the latest Super Bowl odds.

item.title: 2025 CFP Odds: If Indiana Wins, Bettor Turns $15, 4-Leg Parlay Into $5,500
item.description: A quick $15 bet could result in some extra pizza money for one of Indiana's faithful fans. Patrick Everson reports.

item.title: 2025 NFL AFC, NFC Title Odds: Patriots, Seahawks Favored to Make Big Game
item.description: See which squads are favored to make it to the Super Bowl in San Francisco, now that the conference title games are set.

item.title: Chaotic AFCON final an embarrassment to soccer
item.description: Fan clashes, VAR controversies, missed penalties, a walkout, Senegal's extra time winner - the AFCON final had it all.

item.title: The AFC North: 1 coach, 2 (?) starting QBs, many questions
item.description: Mike Tomlin, John Harbaugh and Kevin Stefanski are gone, and probably Aaron Rodgers. So what's next?

item.title: What's next for the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks? First look at the NFL's conference title games
item.description: Let's preview the conference championship matchups. How can the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks advance to the Super Bowl?

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea open to Fernández exit; Madrid, PSG interested
item.description: Chelsea's Enzo Fernández could be available this summer as Real Madrid and PSG monitor his situation. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Transfer window weekly: Güler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
item.description: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?
